java.lang.String.value: This library handles push notification registers from mobile devices and holds a sample push notification sequence.
insert into pushdemo_devices (device_token, comment) values("{{deviceToken}}", "{{comment}}") on duplicate key update comment=values(comment)

Use this sequence to register in a database tokens coming from the mobile devices. The tokens will be in the form of "apns:<token>" for Apple's APNS or "gcm:<registerid>" for android's GCM.
Customize this sequence to save the tokens in a database.
